content: the frog prince & his retainers pattern uses 8ply yarn and a 3 00mm hook easily replicatable to worsted weight for our american friends who can get that size easier - you may just need a size up hook optional hats pattern gives you the option for all 3 hats to choose from eyes 9mm safety eyes or embroidered / felt equivalent the large frog pictured is what happens when you use the equivalent of hobbii honey bunny big for the same pattern
